value.description: The amount of breath to restore.
value.markdownDescription: The amount of breath to restore.

type.description:
## Gain Air

---



[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/gain_air)

Restores breath (bubbles!) to a living entity.

Type ID: `origins:gain_air`




---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:gain_air",
    "value": 20
}
```

This example will restore about 1 second of breath to the entity.
